titleStmt.title: Ho typos, or The pattern of grace and glory In our lord and saviour Jesus Christ, to be admired, adored, and imitated. Collected out of the holy scriptures. Illustrated by the ancient fathers and expositors. Presented with 1. Contemplations. 2. Observations. 3. Confirmations. 4. Doxologies. by Dr. Edward Wolley, Lord Bishop of Clonsert in the Kingdom of Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Wolley, Edward, 1603-1684.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Iosiah Windsor in Castle-street,

notesStmt.note: The first two words of the title page are in Greek.
The words "1. Contemplations. .. Doxologies." are gathered in a left brace of the title page.
With a table of contents at end of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
